game_description: In this VR game you are a legless monkey that uses their hands to move, In this game you can meet other people, Play with friends, Or just play by yourself, The choice is yours, There are many fun mechanics in this game such as Climbing, Running, Jumping, Swimming or just walking, There is also a big variety of maps to explore with more coming in the future.
review_1: This game is fully original and the movement is better than the regular old boring gorilla tag fan games because you can jump very high in this game unlike most fan games the player base is very active and good, players would be willing to help you if you have a problem with the game or if you do not know how to do some thing. The moderators help you if some one is bothering you and helps keep the player base non toxic and all age friendly. This is a very good game and I highly recommend you getting it
review_2: I made the game by you should get it
review_4: Give me mods pls from Zay to chaise
review_5: A bunch of cosmetics you can find and there is alot of maps
